query.statement:
SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.RESPMAN_NM DESC) AS RM ,COUNT(1) OVER() TOTAL_CNT ,A.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT RESPMAN_ID, RESPMAN_NM FROM TN_LAS_SPEAKCONSULT WHERE RESPMAN_ID IS NOT NULL AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND COMP_CD = :vo.session_comp_cd
AND CONVERT(VARCHAR, REG_DT, 112) BETWEEN REPLACE(:vo.weekFirstDay,'-','') AND REPLACE(:vo.weekLastDay,'-','') #if (!$vo.display_yn.equals("Y")) AND WEEKDUTYYN='Y' #end #if (!$vo.display_conf_yn.equals("Y") && $vo.reg_id.equals("")) AND CONF_WEEKDUTYYN='Y' #end
UNION SELECT DISTINCT A.RESPMAN_ID, A.RESPMAN_NM FROM TN_CLM_CONT_CNSDREQ_RESPMAN A, TN_CLM_CONTRACT_CNSD B, TN_CLM_CONT_CNSDREQ C, TN_CLM_CONTRACT_MASTER D, ( SELECT DISTINCT CNSDREQ_ID, CNTRT_ID, WEEKDUTYYN, CONF_WEEKDUTYYN FROM TN_CLM_CONTRACT_DEPTCNSD ) E WHERE A.RESPMAN_ID IS NOT NULL AND A.CNSDREQ_ID = B.CNSDREQ_ID AND B.CNSDREQ_ID = C.CNSDREQ_ID AND B.CNTRT_ID = E.CNTRT_ID AND B.CNSDREQ_ID = E.CNSDREQ_ID AND B.COMP_CD = :vo.session_comp_cd AND C.COMP_CD = :vo.session_comp_cd AND D.COMP_CD = :vo.session_comp_cd AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND D.CNTRT_ID = B.CNTRT_ID AND CONVERT(VARCHAR, B.REG_DT, 112) BETWEEN REPLACE(:vo.weekFirstDay,'-','') AND REPLACE(:vo.weekLastDay,'-','') #if (!$vo.display_yn.equals("Y")) AND UPPER(E.WEEKDUTYYN)='Y' #end #if (!$vo.display_conf_yn.equals("Y") && $vo.reg_id.equals("")) AND UPPER(E.CONF_WEEKDUTYYN)='Y' #end
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT F.RESPMAN_ID, F.RESPMAN_NM FROM TN_LAS_CONSULT DD, (
SELECT CNSLT_NO, HSTRY_NO FROM TN_LAS_CONSULT WHERE 1 = 1 AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND COMP_CD = :vo.session_comp_cd #if (!$vo.display_yn.equals("Y")) AND WEEKDUTYYN='Y' #end #if (!$vo.display_conf_yn.equals("Y") && $vo.reg_id.equals("")) AND CONF_WEEKDUTYYN='Y' #end
AND (CONVERT(VARCHAR, REG_DT, 112) BETWEEN REPLACE(:vo.weekFirstDay,'-','') AND REPLACE(:vo.weekLastDay,'-','') OR CONVERT(VARCHAR,RE_DT, 112) BETWEEN REPLACE(:vo.weekFirstDay,'-','') AND REPLACE(:vo.weekLastDay,'-',''))
) EE, TN_LAS_CONSULT_RESPMAN F WHERE DD.CNSLT_NO=EE.CNSLT_NO AND DD.HSTRY_NO=EE.HSTRY_NO AND DD.CNSLT_NO = F.CNSLT_NO AND DD.COMP_CD = :vo.session_comp_cd AND F.COMP_CD = :vo.session_comp_cd
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT REG_ID, REG_NM FROM TN_LAS_ETC_WEEKDUTY WHERE 1=1 AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND COMP_CD = :vo.session_comp_cd AND CONVERT(VARCHAR, REG_DT, 112) BETWEEN REPLACE(:vo.weekFirstDay,'-','') AND REPLACE(:vo.weekLastDay,'-','')
#if (!$vo.display_conf_yn.equals("Y")) AND (MONTHDUTY_RSLTYN='Y' OR MONTHDUTY_PLANYN = 'Y') #end
) A WHERE A.RESPMAN_NM IS NOT NULL
) B

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC) AS RM ,COUNT(1) OVER() TOTAL_CNT ,A.* FROM ( #if ($vo.page_gbn && $vo.page_gbn.equals("C")) SELECT CASE WHEN :vo.session_user_locale= 'ko' THEN A.CNTRT_NM ELSE ISNULL(A.CNTRT_NM_EN, A.CNTRT_NM) END AS TITLE, B.REQ_DEPT_NM DEPT_NM, D.RESPMAN_NM, 'TN_CLM_CONTRACT_CNSD' TAB, A.CNTRT_ID + '@' + B.CNSDREQ_ID SEQNO, A.CNTRT_ID, ISNULL(B.MAIN_MATR_CONT, ' ') CONT, A.CNTRT_OPPNT_NM COMPANY, CONVERT(VARCHAR, B.REG_DT, 112) REG_DT, ISNULL(B.WEEKDUTYYN, 'Y') WEEKDUTYYN, ISNULL(B.CONF_WEEKDUTYYN, 'Y') CONF_WEEKDUTYYN FROM TN_CLM_CONTRACT_MASTER A, ( SELECT TT.CNTRT_ID, SS.CNSDREQ_ID, E.MAIN_MATR_CONT, SS.REQ_DEPT_NM, TT.REG_DT, E.WEEKDUTYYN, E.CONF_WEEKDUTYYN From TN_CLM_CONT_CNSDREQ SS, TN_CLM_CONTRACT_CNSD TT, ( SELECT CNSDREQ_ID, CNTRT_ID, WEEKDUTYYN, CONF_WEEKDUTYYN, MAIN_MATR_CONT FROM TN_CLM_CONTRACT_DEPTCNSD ) E WHERE SS.CNSDREQ_ID = TT.CNSDREQ_ID AND SS.DEL_YN = 'N' AND TT.CNTRT_ID = E.CNTRT_ID AND TT.CNSDREQ_ID = E.CNSDREQ_ID AND SS.COMP_CD = :vo.session_comp_cd AND TT.COMP_CD = :vo.session_comp_cd #if (!$vo.display_yn.equals("Y")) --display_yn가 'Y'이면 전체를 보여주고 아니면 해당건만 AND UPPER(E.WEEKDUTYYN)='Y' #end #if (!$vo.display_conf_yn.equals("Y")) AND UPPER(E.CONF_WEEKDUTYYN)='Y' #end
#if ($vo.result_yn && $vo.result_yn.equals("P")) AND SS.PRGRS_STATUS < 'C04205' #end #if (!$vo.result_yn || $vo.result_yn.equals("R")) AND SS.PRGRS_STATUS IN ('C04207', 'C04205') #end AND CONVERT(VARCHAR, TT.REG_DT, 112) BETWEEN REPLACE(:vo.weekFirstDay,'-','') AND REPLACE(:vo.weekLastDay,'-','') ) B, TN_CLM_CONT_CNSDREQ_RESPMAN D WHERE 1=1 AND A.COMP_CD = :vo.session_comp_cd AND A.CNTRT_ID = B.CNTRT_ID AND B.CNSDREQ_ID = D.CNSDREQ_ID #if ($vo.reg_id && !$vo.reg_id.equals("")) AND D.RESPMAN_ID = :vo.reg_id #end
#elseif ($vo.page_gbn && $vo.page_gbn.equals("S")) SELECT DD.TITLE, DD.REG_DEPT_NM DEPT_NM, F.RESPMAN_NM, 'TN_LAS_CONSULT' TAB, EE.CNSLT_NO + '@' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, EE.HSTRY_NO) SEQNO, CONVERT(VARCHAR, EE.HSTRY_NO) CNTRT_ID, ISNULL(DD.MAIN_MATR_CONT, ' ') CONT, '' COMPANY, CONVERT(VARCHAR, DD.REG_DT, 112) REG_DT, ISNULL(DD.WEEKDUTYYN, 'Y') WEEKDUTYYN, ISNULL(DD.CONF_WEEKDUTYYN, 'Y') CONF_WEEKDUTYYN FROM TN_LAS_CONSULT DD, ( #if (!$vo.result_yn || $vo.result_yn.equals("R")) SELECT CNSLT_NO, HSTRY_NO FROM TN_LAS_CONSULT WHERE RE_DT IS NOT NULL AND COMP_CD = :vo.session_comp_cd AND DEL_YN = 'N' #if (!$vo.display_yn.equals("Y")) AND UPPER(WEEKDUTYYN)='Y' #end #if (!$vo.display_conf_yn.equals("Y")) AND UPPER(CONF_WEEKDUTYYN)='Y' #end AND CONVERT(VARCHAR, RE_DT, 112) BETWEEN REPLACE(:vo.weekFirstDay,'-','') AND REPLACE(:vo.weekLastDay,'-','')
#end #if ($vo.result_yn && $vo.result_yn.equals("P")) SELECT CNSLT_NO, HSTRY_NO FROM TN_LAS_CONSULT WHERE EXTNL_PRGRS_STATUS = 'S02' AND COMP_CD = :vo.session_comp_cd AND DEL_YN = 'N' #if (!$vo.display_yn.equals("Y")) AND UPPER(WEEKDUTYYN)='Y' #end #if (!$vo.display_conf_yn.equals("Y")) AND UPPER(CONF_WEEKDUTYYN)='Y' #end
AND CONVERT(VARCHAR, REG_DT, 112) BETWEEN REPLACE(:vo.weekFirstDay,'-','') AND REPLACE(:vo.weekLastDay,'-','') #end ) EE, TN_LAS_CONSULT_RESPMAN F WHERE DD.CNSLT_NO=EE.CNSLT_NO AND DD.HSTRY_NO=EE.HSTRY_NO AND DD.CNSLT_NO = F.CNSLT_NO AND DD.COMP_CD = :vo.session_comp_cd #if ($vo.reg_id && !$vo.reg_id.equals("")) AND F.RESPMAN_ID = :vo.reg_id #end
#if (!$vo.result_yn || $vo.result_yn.equals("R")) UNION ALL
SELECT TITLE , REQMAN_DEPT_NM DEPT_NM , RESPMAN_NM , 'TN_LAS_SPEAKCONSULT' TAB , CONVERT(VARCHAR, SEQNO) SEQNO , '' CNTRT_ID , ISNULL(RE_CONT_REF,' ') CONT , REQMAN_DEPT_NM COMPANY , CONVERT(VARCHAR, REG_DT, 112) REG_DT , ISNULL(WEEKDUTYYN, 'Y') WEEKDUTYYN , ISNULL(CONF_WEEKDUTYYN, 'Y') CONF_WEEKDUTYYN FROM TN_LAS_SPEAKCONSULT WHERE 1=1 AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND COMP_CD = :vo.session_comp_cd
#if ($vo.reg_id && !$vo.reg_id.equals("")) AND RESPMAN_ID =:vo.reg_id #end
AND CONVERT(VARCHAR, REG_DT, 112) BETWEEN REPLACE(:vo.weekFirstDay,'-','') AND REPLACE(:vo.weekLastDay,'-','')
#if (!$vo.display_yn.equals("Y")) AND UPPER(WEEKDUTYYN)='Y' #end #if (!$vo.display_conf_yn.equals("Y")) AND UPPER(CONF_WEEKDUTYYN)='Y' #end #end #elseif ($vo.page_gbn && $vo.page_gbn.equals("E")) #if (!$vo.result_yn || $vo.result_yn.equals("P"))
SELECT '' TITLE, REG_NM DEPT_NM, 'TN_LAS_ETC_WEEKDUTY' TAB, SEQNO, '' CNTRT_ID, ISNULL(NEXTWEEK_PLAN, ' ') CONT, '' COMPANY, CONVERT(VARCHAR, REG_DT, 112) REG_DT, ISNULL(MONTHDUTY_PLANYN, 'Y') WEEKDUTYYN, ISNULL(MONTHDUTY_PLANYN, 'Y') CONF_WEEKDUTYYN FROM TN_LAS_ETC_WEEKDUTY A WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.COMP_CD = :vo.session_comp_cd #if (!$vo.display_conf_yn.equals("Y")) AND MONTHDUTY_PLANYN='Y' #end AND CONVERT(VARCHAR, A.REG_DT, 112) BETWEEN REPLACE(:vo.weekFirstDay,'-','') AND REPLACE(:vo.weekLastDay,'-','')
#if ($vo.reg_id && !$vo.reg_id.equals("")) AND A.REG_ID = :vo.reg_id #end
#elseif (!$vo.result_yn || $vo.result_yn.equals("R"))
SELECT '' TITLE, REG_NM DEPT_NM, 'TN_LAS_ETC_WEEKDUTY' TAB, SEQNO, '' CNTRT_ID, ISNULL(CRNTWEEK_RSLT,' ') CONT, '' COMPANY, CONVERT(VARCHAR, REG_DT, 112) REG_DT, ISNULL(MONTHDUTY_RSLTYN, 'Y') WEEKDUTYYN, ISNULL(MONTHDUTY_RSLTYN, 'Y') CONF_WEEKDUTYYN FROM TN_LAS_ETC_WEEKDUTY A WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.COMP_CD = :vo.session_comp_cd #if (!$vo.display_conf_yn.equals("Y")) AND MONTHDUTY_RSLTYN='Y' #end AND CONVERT(VARCHAR, A.REG_DT, 112) BETWEEN REPLACE(:vo.weekFirstDay,'-','') AND REPLACE(:vo.weekLastDay,'-','') #if ($vo.reg_id && !$vo.reg_id.equals("")) AND A.REG_ID = :vo.reg_id #end #end #end ) A ) B
--WHERE B.RM BETWEEN :vo.start_index and :vo.end_index

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC) RM ,COUNT(1) OVER() TOTAL_CNT ,A.* FROM ( SELECT DD.TITLE, DD.REG_DEPT_NM DEPT_NM, 'TN_LAS_CONSULT' TAB, EE.CNSLT_NO + '@' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, EE.HSTRY_NO) SEQNO, CONVERT(VARCHAR, EE.HSTRY_NO) CNTRT_ID, ISNULL(DD.MAIN_MATR_CONT,' ') CONT, '' COMPANY, DD.REG_DT, ISNULL(DD.WEEKDUTYYN, 'Y') WEEKDUTYYN, ISNULL(DD.CONF_WEEKDUTYYN, 'Y') CONF_WEEKDUTYYN FROM TN_LAS_CONSULT DD, ( #if (!$vo.result_yn || $vo.result_yn.equals("R")) SELECT CNSLT_NO, HSTRY_NO FROM TN_LAS_CONSULT WHERE RE_DT IS NOT NULL AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND COMP_CD = :vo.session_comp_cd AND CONVERT(VARCHAR, RE_DT, 112) BETWEEN REPLACE(:vo.weekFirstDay,'-','') AND REPLACE(:vo.weekLastDay,'-','')
#if (!$vo.display_yn || !$vo.display_yn.equals("Y")) AND UPPER(WEEKDUTYYN)='Y' #end #end #if ($vo.result_yn && $vo.result_yn.equals("P")) SELECT CNSLT_NO, HSTRY_NO FROM TN_LAS_CONSULT WHERE EXTNL_PRGRS_STATUS = 'S02' AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND COMP_CD = :vo.session_comp_cd AND CONVERT(VARCHAR, REG_DT, 112) BETWEEN REPLACE(:vo.weekFirstDay,'-','') AND REPLACE(:vo.weekLastDay,'-','')
#if (!$vo.display_yn || !$vo.display_yn.equals("Y")) AND UPPER(WEEKDUTYYN)='Y' #end
#end ) EE, TN_LAS_CONSULT_RESPMAN F WHERE DD.CNSLT_NO = EE.CNSLT_NO AND DD.COMP_CD = :vo.session_comp_cd AND DD.HSTRY_NO = EE.HSTRY_NO AND DD.CNSLT_NO = F.CNSLT_NO AND F.RESPMAN_ID = :vo.session_user_id AND F.COMP_CD = :vo.session_comp_cd #if (!$vo.result_yn || $vo.result_yn.equals("R")) UNION ALL
SELECT TITLE , REQMAN_DEPT_NM DEPT_NM , 'TN_LAS_SPEAKCONSULT' TAB , CONVERT(VARCHAR, SEQNO) SEQNO , '' CNTRT_ID , ISNULL(RE_CONT_REF,' ') CONT , REQMAN_DEPT_NM COMPANY , REG_DT , ISNULL(WEEKDUTYYN, 'Y') WEEKDUTYYN , ISNULL(CONF_WEEKDUTYYN, 'Y') CONF_WEEKDUTYYN FROM TN_LAS_SPEAKCONSULT WHERE 1=1 AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND COMP_CD = :vo.session_comp_cd #if ($vo.reg_id && !$vo.reg_id.equals("")) AND RESPMAN_ID = :vo.reg_id #end
AND CONVERT(VARCHAR, REG_DT, 112) BETWEEN REPLACE(:vo.weekFirstDay,'-','') AND REPLACE(:vo.weekLastDay,'-','') #if (!$vo.display_yn || !$vo.display_yn.equals("Y")) AND UPPER(WEEKDUTYYN)='Y' #end #end ) A
) B

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC) RM ,COUNT(1) OVER() TOTAL_CNT ,A.* FROM ( SELECT A.CRNTWEEK_RSLT ,A.NEXTWEEK_PLAN ,CONVERT(VARCHAR, A.REG_DT, 112) REG_DT ,A.SEQNO FROM TN_LAS_ETC_WEEKDUTY A WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.COMP_CD = :vo.session_comp_cd #if ($vo.dmstfrgn_gbn && !$vo.dmstfrgn_gbn.equals("")) AND A.DMSTFRGN_GBN = :vo.dmstfrgn_gbn #end
AND CONVERT(VARCHAR, A.REG_DT, 112) BETWEEN REPLACE(:vo.weekFirstDay,'-','') AND REPLACE(:vo.weekLastDay,'-','') AND A.REG_ID = :vo.session_user_id ) A
) B
WHERE B.RM = 1

INSERT INTO TN_LAS_ETC_WEEKDUTY ( SEQNO , COMP_CD , DMSTFRGN_GBN , CRNTWEEK_RSLT , NEXTWEEK_PLAN , GRPMGR_REDEPT , REG_DT , REG_ID , REG_NM
) VALUES ( :vo.seqno , :vo.session_comp_cd , :vo.dmstfrgn_gbn , :vo.crntweek_rslt , :vo.nextweek_plan , :vo.grpmgr_redept , GETDATE() , :vo.session_user_id , :vo.session_user_nm )

#if ($vo.tab && $vo.tab.equals("TN_LAS_CONSULT"))
UPDATE TN_LAS_CONSULT SET #if ($vo.page_gbn && $vo.page_gbn.equals("A")) CONF_WEEKDUTYYN = :vo.weekdutyyn #else WEEKDUTYYN = :vo.weekdutyyn #end WHERE CNSLT_NO = :vo.cntrt_id AND HSTRY_NO = :vo.cnsdreq_id
#elseif ($vo.tab && $vo.tab.equals("TN_LAS_SPEAKCONSULT"))
UPDATE TN_LAS_SPEAKCONSULT SET #if ($vo.page_gbn && $vo.page_gbn.equals("A")) CONF_WEEKDUTYYN = :vo.weekdutyyn #else RE_CONT_REF = :vo.cont , WEEKDUTYYN = :vo.weekdutyyn #end WHERE SEQNO = :vo.seqno
#elseif ($vo.tab && $vo.tab.equals("TN_CLM_CONTRACT_CNSD"))
UPDATE TN_CLM_CONTRACT_DEPTCNSD SET #if ($vo.page_gbn && $vo.page_gbn.equals("A")) CONF_WEEKDUTYYN = :vo.weekdutyyn #else WEEKDUTYYN = :vo.weekdutyyn #end WHERE CNTRT_ID = :vo.cntrt_id AND CNSDREQ_ID = :vo.cnsdreq_id #elseif ($vo.tab && $vo.tab.equals("TN_LAS_ETC_WEEKDUTY") && !$vo.page_gbn.equals("A"))
UPDATE TN_LAS_ETC_WEEKDUTY SET CRNTWEEK_RSLT = :vo.crntweek_rslt , NEXTWEEK_PLAN = :vo.nextweek_plan WHERE SEQNO = :vo.seqno #elseif ($vo.tab && $vo.tab.equals("TN_LAS_ETC_WEEKDUTY") && $vo.page_gbn.equals("A"))
UPDATE TN_LAS_ETC_WEEKDUTY SET #if ($vo.page_gbn && $vo.page_gbn.equals("A")) #if ($vo.result_yn && $vo.result_yn.equals("P")) MONTHDUTY_PLANYN = :vo.weekdutyyn, WEEKDUTYYN = :vo.weekdutyyn, #else MONTHDUTY_RSLTYN = :vo.weekdutyyn, WEEKDUTYYN = :vo.weekdutyyn, #end #end MOD_DT = SYSDATE WHERE SEQNO = :vo.seqno #end
